contentrichtext.text: '''QAD''' may refer to: * A constellation identified by its quadruple stars. * [[QAD Inc]], a software company * q.a.d., a [[List of medical abbreviations: Q|medical abbreviation]] for "every other day" ({{lang|la|''quaque altera die''}}) * ''QAD: Quintessential Art of Destruction'', an [[Index of MS-DOS games (Q)|MS-DOS game]] * Quality Assurance Division, part of the [[Malaysian Qualifications Framework]] * Quality Assurance Directorate, a directorate of the [[Royal Arsenal]] {{disambiguation}}
